name: Kavu Recluse
text: {T}: Target land becomes a Forest until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Few ever see this particular breed of kavu, which hides in forests of its own making.

name: Kavu Runner
text: Kavu Runner has haste as long as no opponent controls a white or blue creature.

name: Kavu Scout
text: Domain — Kavu Scout gets +1/+0 for each basic land type among lands you control.

editions.flavor: The kavu evolved for centuries deep inside Dominaria, and some can draw from its strength.

name: Kavu Titan
text:
Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)
If Kavu Titan was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it and with trample.

name: Kaya, Ghost Assassin
text:
0: Exile Kaya, Ghost Assassin or up to one target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. You lose 2 life.
−1: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
−2: Each opponent discards a card and you draw a card.

name: Kaysa
text: Green creatures you control get +1/+1.

editions.flavor: Kaysa speaks as the elder druid, but Yavimaya recognizes only one voice: its own.
Kaysa speaks as the Elder Druid, but the Yavimaya recognizes only one voice: its own.

name: Kazandu Blademaster
text:
First strike, vigilance
Whenever Kazandu Blademaster or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Kazandu Blademaster.

editions.flavor: "If you hire a sell-sword, you'd better watch your back. Hire me, and I'll watch it for you."

name: Kazandu Refuge
text:
Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.
When Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas

name: Kazandu Tuskcaller
text:
Level up {1}{G} ({1}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 2-5
1/1
{T}: Create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.
LEVEL 6+
1/1
{T}: Create two 3/3 green Elephant creature tokens.

name: Kazuul's Toll Collector
text: {0}: Attach target Equipment you control to Kazuul's Toll Collector. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

editions.flavor: Travelers are advised to bring extra swords, preferably shiny ones.

name: Kazuul, Tyrant of the Cliffs
text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, if you're the defending player, create a 3/3 red Ogre creature token unless that creature's controller pays {3}.

editions.flavor: Warning to those who scale the cliffs without paying tribute: It's a long way down.
Warning to those who scale the cliffs without paying tribute: It's a long way down.

name: Kazuul Warlord
text: Whenever Kazuul Warlord or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Ally creature you control.

editions.flavor: On expeditions, minotaurs are worth their weight in gold. Fortunately for their paymasters, most minotaurs don't know how much they weigh.

name: Kederekt Creeper
text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

editions.flavor: Bloated with venom, it crawls Grixis looking for victims to ooze onto.

name: Kederekt Leviathan
text:
When Kederekt Leviathan enters the battlefield, return all other nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
Unearth {6}{U} ({6}{U}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Kederekt Parasite
text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, if you control a red permanent, you may have Kederekt Parasite deal 1 damage to that player.

editions.flavor: When the smell of passing thoughts piques its hunger, its maw becomes primed with acid and a taste for brains.

name: Keeneye Aven
text:
Flying
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

editions.flavor: "I have no need of a map. The continent itself guides my way."
"I have no need of a map. The very continent itself guides my way."

name: Keen-Eyed Archers
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

editions.flavor: "If it has wings, shoot it. If it doesn't, shoot it anyway."

name: Keening Apparition
text: Sacrifice Keening Apparition: Destroy target enchantment.

editions.flavor: Some souls are too damaged to be of use to the Orzhov.

name: Keening Banshee
text:
Flying
When Keening Banshee enters the battlefield, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

editions.set: Duel Decks Anthology, Garruk vs. Liliana
editions.flavor: Her cold wail echoes in the alleys and under-eaves, finding the unfortunate and turning their blood to ice.
Her cold wail echoes in the alleys and under-eaves, finding the unfortunate and turning their blood to ice.
Her cold wail echoes in the alleys and under-eaves, finding the unfortunate and turning their blood to ice.

name: Keening Stone
text: {5}, {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of cards in that player's graveyard.

editions.flavor: As it spins, dead voices shriek in an ever-increasing cacophony, rending the mind asunder.
As it spins, dead voices shriek in an ever-increasing cacophony, rending the mind asunder.

name: Keen Sense
text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

editions.flavor: Crovax sensed that Mirri wasn't ready for the curse taking hold of her. Weeping in his heart, he fled.

name: Keeper of Keys
text:
When Keeper of Keys enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you're the monarch, creatures you control can't be blocked this turn.

editions.flavor: For the right price, he'll unlock your path to the throne.

name: Keeper of Kookus
text: {R}: Keeper of Kookus gains protection from red until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Wanted: Thick-skinned goblin for guarding mean ol' Kookus. Must like fires. Must heal quickly.

name: Keeper of Progenitus
text: Whenever a player taps a Mountain, Forest, or Plains for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced.

editions.flavor: He watches over the valley where Progenitus sleeps, culling signs from its steaming breaths.

name: Keeper of the Beasts
text: {G}, {T}: Choose target opponent who controlled more creatures than you did as you activated this ability. Create a 2/2 green Beast creature token.

name: Keeper of the Dead
text: {B}, {T}: Choose target opponent who had at least two fewer creature cards in his or her graveyard than you did as you activated this ability. Destroy target nonblack creature he or she controls.

name: Keeper of the Flame
text: {R}, {T}: Choose target opponent who had more life than you did as you activated this ability. Keeper of the Flame deals 2 damage to him or her.

name: Keeper of the Lens
text: You may look at face-down creatures you don't control. (You may do this at any time.)

editions.flavor:
"It sees all, but it reveals what it sees only to a chosen few."
—Taigam, Ojutai master

name: Keeper of the Light
text: {W}, {T}: Choose target opponent who had more life than you did as you activated this ability. You gain 3 life.

name: Keeper of the Mind
text: {U}, {T}: Choose target opponent who had at least two more cards in hand than you did as you activated this ability. Draw a card.

name: Keeper of the Nine Gales
text:
Flying
{T}, Tap two untapped Birds you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

editions.flavor: "You cannot fight the storm."

name: Keeper of the Sacred Word
text:
As Keeper of the Sacred Word comes into play, choose a word.
Whenever an opponent says the chosen word, Keeper of the Sacred Word gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: This is not a subliminal message.

name: Keeper of Tresserhorn
text: Whenever Keeper of Tresserhorn attacks and isn't blocked, it assigns no combat damage this turn and defending player loses 2 life.

editions.flavor: And then the Archangel Anthius spoke to them, saying, "Fear shall be vanquished by the Sword of Faith."

Deathtouch

name: Keep Watch
text: Draw a card for each attacking creature.

editions.flavor: "I see their moral dilemmas. I see their raw courage. I see their self-sacrifice. I see our victory."

text:

name: Kelinore Bat
text: Flying

name: Kemba's Legion
text:
Vigilance

Indestructible

Defender

When Kheru Spellsnatcher is turned face up, counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled.
